channel.title: Does anyone know how to change the background image of a client?

item.title: Does anyone know how to change the background image of a client?
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

The location of the background should be as stated above but it might be named bg.png or something else.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how to change the background image of a client?

item.title: Does anyone know how to change the background image of a client?
item.dc:creator: @JoesServers JoesServers
item.description:
@JoesServers wrote:

Search in your client and cache files for “background.png” and there may be one so be sure to change both, if this doesnt work then the background is one that links to online and it is unchangeable unless you find the code in the client to change it.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how to change the background image of a client?

item.title: Does anyone know how to change the background image of a client?
item.dc:creator: @Mikey96 Mikey96
item.description:
@Mikey96 wrote:

deadlyhorror:

This is in your cache. If you go to your c drive and find the cache you’re using and then find sprites, there will be a picture that’s named background, just replace it with whatever pic you want and rename it background.

Its not working it is for teamtorva?

Read full topic
